name: iOS 16.1 and iPadOS 16
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing additional entitlements.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to disclosure of user information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access iOS backups
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted certificate may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A certificate validation issue existed in the handling of WKWebView. This issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Jonathan Zhang of Open Computing Facility (ocf.berkeley.edu)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to record audio with paired AirPods
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions on third party apps.

cves.credit: Guilherme Rambo of Best Buddy Apps (rambo.codes)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to record audio using a pair of connected AirPods
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved entitlements.

cves.credit: Guilherme Rambo of Best Buddy Apps (rambo.codes)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user may be able to view restricted content from the lock screen
advisories.description: A lock screen issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Peter Pan ZhenPeng of STAR Labs

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination or potentially execute code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi of Pangu Lab, John Aakerblom (@jaakerblom)

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause kernel code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may disclose memory contents
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: A buffer overflow may result in arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges

advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved locking.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a maliciously crafted website may leak sensitive data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Mir Masood Ali, PhD student, University of Illinois at Chicago; Binoy Chitale, MS student, Stony Brook University; Mohammad Ghasemisharif, PhD Candidate, University of Illinois at Chicago; Chris Kanich, Associate Professor, University of Illinois at Chicago; Nick Nikiforakis, Associate Professor, Stony Brook University; Jason Polakis, Associate Professor, University of Illinois at Chicago

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A shortcut may be able to check the existence of an arbitrary path on the file system
advisories.description: A parsing issue in the handling of directory paths was addressed with improved path validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information

advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to user interface spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose internal states of the app

advisories.impact: Joining a malicious Wi-Fi network may result in a denial-of-service of the Settings app
